snippet: Voter turnout lags in California, as in most states. But give the Golden State credit for trying to improve participation.    Registering to vote is easy. Sometimes newspapers distribute the forms....
lead_paragraph: Voter turnout lags in California, as in most states. But give the Golden State credit for trying to improve participation. Registering to vote is easy. Sometimes newspapers distribute the forms.
abstract: fraud worries greet on vote-delivery bill**California Assembly approves measures that would make it easier to vote by means of absentee ballot, causing some concern about greater opportunity for voting fraud (S)

headline.main: Fraud Worries Greet A Vote-Delivery Bill
